1.「時の王者 <pc>さま。| この光を ご覧ください。: The King of Time<pc> Sir. Look at this light...

3.「叙事詩といっても じつは書ではなく | かつての聖竜の 精神の残滓とでも呼ぶべ:
An epic poem is not really a book, but rather|a glimmer of light, a residue of the spirit|of the holy dragons of old, telling us of|
|past events...

4.「それでは 叙事詩に問いかけてみましょう。 | 我らの 歩むべき道を。: So let's ask the epic question... "Where|shall we go...

7.「これは……凍えきった光……。 | 幾星霜の年月を経たことで| 今は 眠りについ: This is... A frozen light... After all these|years, it's asleep now.

8.「<pc>さま……。| 我ら 世告げの姫に受け継がれてきた| 伝承の中に このよ: <pc> Oh, my... In the lore passed down to us, the|princesses of Sekigahara, there is something|like this...

9.「グレイナル叙事詩を 眠りから覚ますのならば| 竜の火酒を 求めよ……。| 火酒:
If you would awaken the epic of Grunal from|its slumber, seek the fire wine of the|dragon... "The fire wine is made by the fire|
|lizards of the Mountain of Fire.

10.「炎の山の火トカゲとは| ドワチャッカ大陸の カルサドラ火山に生息する| 赤き魔:
The Fire Lizard of the Flaming Mountain is a|red demon <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> that inhabits the|Kalsadra volcano on the continent of|
|Dwacha...

11.「どうか その魔物を倒し| 竜の火酒を 手に入れてきてくださいまし。: Please go defeat that demon and get the|dragon's fire wine...

12.「……さすがは <pc>さま。| グレイナル叙事詩を 目覚めさせるための| 竜の: As expected<pc> My Lord. Please go and get me the dragon's|fire wine to wake up the epicureans of|Graenal...

13.ロディアに 竜の火酒を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Do you want me to give Rodia the dragon's|fire wine?<yesno><close>

14.「竜の火酒がなければ グレイナル叙事詩を| 目覚めさせることはできません……。|: Without the Dragon's Fire Wine, we cannot|awaken the Graenal Epic...<pc> Sir, please...

15.ロディアに 竜の火酒を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Do you want me to give Rodia the dragon's|fire wine?<yesno><close>

17.「これが竜の火酒……| 強い魔力を感じます。: This is the Dragon's Sake... I sense a strong magical power.

18.「聖竜よ。竜の火酒を 捧げます。| どうか 目をお覚ましください……。: ... I offer you the Dragon's Fire Wine...|Please, wake up...

19.ロディアは 竜の火酒を泉に注いだ。: Rodia took the dragon's fire wine to the|spring.

20.<center>……長い…あまりにも長い眠りじゃった。: ... Too long... Too long a sleep...

21.「……聖竜グレイナルよ。 | お目覚めを 待ち望んでおりました。: ... Gray the holy dragon... I've been waiting|for you to wake up...

22.<center>ふう…………。|ふたたび 災厄の時が訪れたか。: Hmm... Once again, the time of disaster has|come...

23.<center>そして そこの者よ。|貴様が 時の王者……であるか？: And there... You are the Time Lord... Are|you?

24.<center>貴様が 災厄の王への道を開くために|わしを訪ねてきたこと|このグ: You have come to me to pave the way for the|King of Mischief, and I know all about it...

25.<center>……思いだすのう。|初代王者と翔けた あの空を。: ... I remember... Flying with the first|champion...

26.<center>できることなら わしの翼で 貴様を|災厄の王が眠る地まで 導いて:
If I could, I would use my wings to guide you|to the land where the King of Misfortune|lies, but with a body like this, I'm afraid I|
|can't.

27.<center>災厄は 長き眠りの時代を経て|想像を絶するほどに|強大な存在へと: A plague that, after a long period of|slumber, has transformed itself into a being|of unimaginable power.

28.<center>ふたりめの王者の言うとおり|もはや 王者ただひとりのチカラで|打: The second champion is right. No longer will|the power of one champion alone be enough to|destroy...

29.<center>ゆえに わしが|貴様に 新たなチカラを授けてやろう。: Therefore, I will give you new powers...

31.<center>そのカギは 王者の資格を持つ者同士を|巡り合わせるためのもの。: The key is to bring together those who are|qualified to be champions...

32.<center>名などない物だが……そうじゃな。|王者のカギとでも 名付けるとし: It has no name, but... Well... The key of|champions, if you will.

33.<center>そのカギに導かれ 集まった者同士が|同盟を組んだならば ８人のチ:
If we are guided by that key, if we gather|together and form an alliance, we can unite|the power of the eight of us and challenge|
|the King of Mischief...

34.<center>たとえ ひとりでは敵わぬとも|８人の王者のチカラが集えば|かの災: Even if you can't defeat them alone, with the|power of eight champions, you might be able|to defeat their evil.

35.<center>さあ 行け 時の王者よ。|貴様自身の手で 地獄の門を開き|地獄の: Now, go, time... Open the gates of hell with|your own hands and fly through it!

36.<center>わしは 今一度 長き…長き眠りにつき|次代…の 到来…を待と…う: I have slept a long time... The long sleep of|the next generation. And wait... The next...|I...

37.「時の王者 <pc>さま……。| 私は このカギを手に 落陽の草原へ戻り| <p: The King of Time<pc>  Wander... I returned to the meadow of the|setting sun with this key in my hand.<pc> We are waiting for you...

38.「ついに 災厄の王との決戦となります。 | 充分に備えて いらしてください。|: At last, the battle with the King of|Mischief... Please come well prepared. I hope|you find this useful in your fight...

39.「落陽の草原の 光の河……。| そこより 地獄の門を開きましょう。: "A river of light in a meadow of falling|sunlight... From there, I will open the gates|of hell...
